name: Arena Fighter
description:
In this game you will have to fight through waves of enemys. Buy upgrades in the shop to make it easier. 

But watch out. The Bats are very fast and do not shy away from dashing rigth into you.

The mages have a powerfull ranged attack, that can hit you from far away.

Made for the Miziziziz Game Jam.

Art Assets from Kenney
